verses.verse: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אֱלִישָׁ֔ע <WH477> Then Elisha שִׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> Hear דְּבַר־ <WH1697> ye the word יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD כָּעֵ֤ת ׀ <WH6256> about this time מָחָר֙ <WH4279> To morrow סְאָֽה־ <WH5429> [shall] a measure סֹ֣לֶת <WH5560> of fine flour בְּשֶׁ֗קֶל <WH8255> [be sold] for a shekel וְסָאתַ֧יִם <WH5429> and two measures שְׂעֹרִ֛ים <WH8184> of barley בְּשֶׁ֖קֶל <WH8255> for a shekel בְּשַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> in the gate שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <WH8111> of Samaria

וַיַּ֣עַן <WH6030> answered הַשָּׁלִ֡ישׁ <WH7991> Then a lord אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whose לַמֶּלֶךְ֩ <WH4428> the king נִשְׁעָ֨ן <WH8172> leaned עַל־ <WH5921> and יָד֜וֹ <WH3027> on whose hand אֶת־ <WH853> אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> the man הָאֱלֹהִים֮ <WH430> of God וַיֹּאמַר֒ <WH559> and said הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Behold [if] the LORD עֹשֶׂ֤ה <WH6213> would make אֲרֻבּוֹת֙ <WH699> windows בַּשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> in heaven הֲיִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> might this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> be? And he said הִנְּכָ֤ה <WH2005> behold רֹאֶה֙ <WH7200> Behold thou shalt see בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <WH5869> [it] with thine eyes וּמִשָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> in it לֹ֥א <WH3808> you will not תֹאכֵֽל׃ <WH398> but shalt not eat ס

וְאַרְבָּעָ֧ה <WH702> And there were four אֲנָשִׁ֛ים <WH376> one הָי֥וּ <WH1961> become מְצֹרָעִ֖ים <WH6879> leprous פֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> at the entering in הַשָּׁ֑עַר <WH8179> of the gate וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> and they said אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> to one אֶל־ <WH413> about רֵעֵ֔הוּ <WH7453> to another מָ֗ה <WH4100> Why אֲנַ֛חְנוּ <WH587> we יֹשְׁבִ֥ים <WH3427> Why sit פֹּ֖ה <WH6311> here עַד־ <WH5704> until מָֽתְנוּ׃ <WH4191> we here until we die

אִם־ <WH518> If אָמַרְנוּ֩ <WH559> If we say נָב֨וֹא <WH935> We will enter הָעִ֜יר <WH5892> into the city וְהָרָעָ֤ב <WH7458> then the famine בָּעִיר֙ <WH5892> [is] in the city וָמַ֣תְנוּ <WH4191> and we shall die שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> there וְאִם־ <WH518> and if יָשַׁ֥בְנוּ <WH3427> there and if we sit still פֹ֖ה <WH6311> here וָמָ֑תְנוּ <WH4191> here we die וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now לְכוּ֙ <WH1980> come וְנִפְּלָה֙ <WH5307> and let us fall אֶל־ <WH413> to מַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> unto the host אֲרָ֔ם <WH758> of the Syrians אִם־ <WH518> If יְחַיֻּ֣נוּ <WH2421> if they save us alive נִֽחְיֶ֔ה <WH2421> we shall live וְאִם־ <WH518> and if יְמִיתֻ֖נוּ <WH4191> and if they kill וָמָֽתְנוּ׃ <WH4191> us we shall but die

וַיָּק֣וּמוּ <WH6965> And they rose up בַנֶּ֔שֶׁף <WH5399> in the twilight לָב֖וֹא <WH935> to go אֶל־ <WH413> to מַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> unto the camp אֲרָ֑ם <WH758> of the Syrians וַיָּבֹ֗אוּ <WH935> and when they were come עַד־ <WH5704> against קְצֵה֙ <WH7097> to the uttermost part מַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> of the camp אֲרָ֔ם <WH758> of Syria וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold אֵֽין־ <WH369> there שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> behold [there was] no man

וַאדֹנָ֞י <WH136> For the Lord הִשְׁמִ֣יעַ ׀ <WH8085> to hear אֶת־ <WH853> מַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> had made the host אֲרָ֗ם <WH758> of the Syrians ק֥וֹל <WH6963> a noise רֶ֙כֶב֙ <WH7393> of chariots ק֣וֹל <WH6963> and a noise ס֔וּס <WH5483> of horses ק֖וֹל <WH6963> [even] the noise חַ֣יִל <WH2428> host גָּד֑וֹל <WH1419> of a great וַיֹּאמְר֞וּ <WH559> and they said אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> one אֶל־ <WH413> about אָחִ֗יו <WH251> to another הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold שָֽׂכַר־ <WH7936> hath hired עָלֵינוּ֩ <WH5921> against מֶ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> Lo the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> מַלְכֵ֧י <WH4428> against us the kings הַחִתִּ֛ים <WH2850> of the Hittites וְאֶת־ <WH853> מַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> and the kings מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of the Egyptians לָב֥וֹא <WH935> to come עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5921> against

וַיָּקוּמוּ֮ <WH6965> Wherefore they arose וַיָּנ֣וּסוּ <WH5127> and fled בַנֶּשֶׁף֒ <WH5399> in the twilight וַיַּעַזְב֣וּ <WH5800> and left אֶת־ <WH853> אָהֳלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH168> their tents וְאֶת־ <WH853> סֽוּסֵיהֶם֙ <WH5483> and their horses וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֲמֹ֣רֵיהֶ֔ם <WH2543> and their asses הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <WH4264> even the camp כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after הִ֑יא <WH1931> it was וַיָּנֻ֖סוּ <WH5127> as it [was] and fled אֶל־ <WH413> for נַפְשָֽׁם׃ <WH5315> for their life

וַיָּבֹאוּ֩ <WH935> came הַֽמְצֹרָעִ֨ים <WH6879> And when these lepers הָאֵ֜לֶּה <WH428> these עַד־ <WH5704> against קְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> to the uttermost part הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֗ה <WH4264> of the camp וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <WH935> they went אֶל־ <WH413> about אֹ֤הֶל <WH168> tent אֶחָד֙ <WH259> into one וַיֹּאכְל֣וּ <WH398> and did eat וַיִּשְׁתּ֔וּ <WH8354> and drink וַיִּשְׂא֣וּ <WH5375> and carried מִשָּׁ֗ם <WH8033> there כֶּ֤סֶף <WH3701> thence silver וְזָהָב֙ <WH2091> and gold וּבְגָדִ֔ים <WH899> and raiment וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> and went וַיַּטְמִ֑נוּ <WH2934> and hid וַיָּשֻׁ֗בוּ <WH7725> [it] and came again וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> and entered אֶל־ <WH413> about אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> tent אַחֵ֔ר <WH312> into another וַיִּשְׂא֣וּ <WH5375> and carried מִשָּׁ֔ם <WH8033> there וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> and went וַיַּטְמִֽנוּ׃ <WH2934> and hid

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֩ <WH559> Then they said אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> one אֶל־ <WH413> about רֵעֵ֜הוּ <WH7453> to another לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not כֵ֣ן ׀ <WH3651> after that אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <WH587> we עֹשִׂ֗ים <WH6213> We do הַיּ֤וֹם <WH3117> not well this day הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> This יוֹם־ <WH3117> [is] a day בְּשֹׂרָ֣ה <WH1309> of good tidings ה֔וּא <WH1931> he וַאֲנַ֣חְנוּ <WH587> we מַחְשִׁ֗ים <WH2814> and we hold our peace וְחִכִּ֛ינוּ <WH2442> if we tarry עַד־ <WH5704> until א֥וֹר <WH216> light הַבֹּ֖קֶר <WH1242> till the morning וּמְצָאָ֣נוּ <WH4672> will come עָו֑וֹן <WH5771> some mischief וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> Now לְכ֣וּ <WH1980> come וְנָבֹ֔אָה <WH935> that we may go וְנַגִּ֖ידָה <WH5046> and tell בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> household הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> the king's

וַיָּבֹ֗אוּ <WH935> So they came וַֽיִּקְרְאוּ֮ <WH7121> and called אֶל־ <WH413> to שֹׁעֵ֣ר <WH7778> unto the porter הָעִיר֒ <WH5892> of the city וַיַּגִּ֤ידוּ <WH5046> and they told לָהֶם֙ <WH1992> them לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> them saying בָּ֚אנוּ <WH935> We came אֶל־ <WH413> to מַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> to the camp אֲרָ֔ם <WH758> of the Syrians וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and behold אֵֽין־ <WH369> there שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> there אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> and behold [there was] no man וְק֣וֹל <WH6963> there neither voice אָדָ֑ם <WH120> of man כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo הַסּ֤וּס <WH5483> but horses אָסוּר֙ <WH631> tied וְהַחֲמ֣וֹר <WH2543> and asses אָס֔וּר <WH631> tied וְאֹהָלִ֖ים <WH168> and the tents כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> like
וַיִּקְרָ֖א <WH7121> And he called הַשֹּֽׁעֲרִ֑ים <WH7778> the porters וַיַּגִּ֕ידוּ <WH5046> and they told בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> [it] to the king's פְּנִֽימָה׃ <WH6441> within

וַיָּ֨קָם <WH6965> arose הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king לַ֗יְלָה <WH3915> in the night וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said אֶל־ <WH413> to his עֲבָדָ֔יו <WH5650> unto his servants אַגִּֽידָה־ <WH5046> I will now shew נָּ֣א <WH4994> will now לָכֶ֔ם אֵ֛ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what עָ֥שׂוּ <WH6213> have done לָ֖נוּ אֲרָ֑ם <WH758> you what the Syrians יָדְע֞וּ <WH3045> to us They know כִּי־ <WH3588> When רְעֵבִ֣ים <WH7457> that we [be] hungry אֲנַ֗חְנוּ <WH587> we וַיֵּצְא֤וּ <WH3318> therefore are they gone out מִן־ <WH4480> from הַֽמַּחֲנֶה֙ <WH4264> of the camp לְהֵחָבֵ֤ה <WH2247> to hide [בְהַשָּׂדֶה כ] (בַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> country ק) לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When יֵצְא֤וּ <WH3318> When they come out מִן־ <WH4480> out הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> of the city וְנִתְפְּשֵׂ֣ם <WH8610> we shall catch חַיִּ֔ים <WH2416> them alive וְאֶל־ <WH413> of הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> into the city נָבֹֽא׃ <WH935> and get

וַיַּעַן֩ <WH6030> answered אֶחָ֨ד <WH259> And one מֵעֲבָדָ֜יו <WH5650> of his servants וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said וְיִקְחוּ־ <WH3947> Let [some] take נָ֞א <WH4994> Please חֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <WH2568> I pray thee five מִן־ <WH4480> at הַסּוּסִים֮ <WH5483> of the horses הַֽנִּשְׁאָרִים֮ <WH7604> that remain אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which נִשְׁאֲרוּ־ <WH7604> which are left בָהּ֒ הִנָּ֗ם <WH2009> Behold כְּכָל־ <WH3605> all [הֶהָמֹון כ] (הֲמֹ֤ון <WH1995> the multitude ק) יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who נִשְׁאֲרוּ־ <WH7604> that are left בָ֔הּ הִנָּ֕ם <WH2005> like כְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הֲמ֥וֹן <WH1995> in the city (behold they [are] as all the multitude יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of the Israelites אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who תָּ֑מּוּ <WH8552> that are consumed וְנִשְׁלְחָ֖ה <WH7971> ) and let us send וְנִרְאֶֽה׃ <WH7200> and see

וַיִּקְח֕וּ <WH3947> They took שְׁנֵ֖י <WH8147> therefore two רֶ֣כֶב <WH7393> chariot סוּסִ֑ים <WH5483> horses וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <WH7971> sent הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king אַחֲרֵ֧י <WH310> after מַחֲנֵֽה־ <WH4264> the host אֲרָ֛ם <WH758> of the Syrians לֵאמֹ֖ר <WH559> saying לְכ֥וּ <WH1980> Go וּרְאֽוּ׃ <WH7200> and see

וַיֵּלְכ֣וּ <WH1980> went אַחֲרֵיהֶם֮ <WH310> after עַד־ <WH5704> them הַיַּרְדֵּן֒ <WH3383> them unto Jordan וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> and behold כָל־ <WH3605> all הַדֶּ֗רֶךְ <WH1870> and lo all the way מְלֵאָ֤ה <WH4392> [was] full בְגָדִים֙ <WH899> of garments וְכֵלִ֔ים <WH3627> and vessels אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הִשְׁלִ֥יכוּ <WH7993> had cast away אֲרָ֖ם <WH758> which the Syrians [בְּהֵחָפְזָם כ] (בְּחָפְזָ֑ם <WH2648> haste ק) וַיָּשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <WH7725> returned הַמַּלְאָכִ֔ים <WH4397> And the messengers וַיַּגִּ֖דוּ <WH5046> and told לַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> the king

וַיֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> went out הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> And the people וַיָּבֹ֕זּוּ <WH962> and spoiled אֵ֖ת <WH853> מַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> the tents אֲרָ֑ם <WH758> of the Syrians וַיְהִ֨י <WH1961> Then סְאָה־ <WH5429> So a measure סֹ֜לֶת <WH5560> of fine flour בְּשֶׁ֗קֶל <WH8255> was [sold] for a shekel וְסָאתַ֧יִם <WH5429> and two measures שְׂעֹרִ֛ים <WH8184> of barley בְּשֶׁ֖קֶל <WH8255> for a shekel כִּדְבַ֥ר <WH1697> according to the word יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְהַמֶּלֶךְ֩ <WH4428> And the king הִפְקִ֨יד <WH6485> appointed אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׁלִ֜ישׁ <WH7991> the lord אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whose נִשְׁעָ֤ן <WH8172> he leaned עַל־ <WH5921> to have יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> on whose hand עַל־ <WH5921> charge הַשַּׁ֔עַר <WH8179> to have the charge of the gate וַיִּרְמְסֻ֧הוּ <WH7429> trode הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> and the people בַּשַּׁ֖עַר <WH8179> upon him in the gate וַיָּמֹ֑ת <WH4191> and he died כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who דִּבֶּר֙ <WH1696> had said אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> as the man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who דִּבֶּ֔ר <WH1696> who spake בְּרֶ֥דֶת <WH3381> came down הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> when the king אֵלָֽיו׃ <WH413> about

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> happened כְּדַבֵּר֙ <WH1696> had spoken אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> And it came to pass as the man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying סָאתַ֨יִם <WH5429> Two measures שְׂעֹרִ֜ים <WH8184> of barley בְּשֶׁ֗קֶל <WH8255> for a shekel וּֽסְאָה־ <WH5429> and a measure סֹ֙לֶת֙ <WH5560> of fine flour בְּשֶׁ֔קֶל <WH8255> for a shekel יִהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> happened כָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> about this time מָחָ֔ר <WH4279> shall be to morrow בְּשַׁ֖עַר <WH8179> in the gate שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <WH8111> of Samaria
